name: Modern
description: Sleek and functional with clean lines, glass shower enclosures, and minimal fixtures.

name: Traditional
description: Classic design featuring elegant fixtures, ornate mirrors, and rich color palettes.

name: Rustic
description: Natural materials like wood and stone with earthy tones and vintage-style fixtures.

name: Industrial
description: Raw, exposed materials like brick and metal with minimalist design elements.

name: Minimalist
description: Clean, clutter-free design with neutral colors and functional fixtures.

name: Scandinavian
description: Bright and airy space with natural wood, white tiles, and sleek fixtures.

name: Bohemian
description: An artistic and eclectic style with vibrant tiles, plants, and personalized decor.

name: Luxury
description: High-end materials like marble and gold fixtures, creating a spa-like experience.

name: Farmhouse
description: A cozy, rustic space with wood accents, vintage fixtures, and a classic clawfoot tub.

name: Mid-Century Modern
description: Retro-inspired design with bold colors, geometric shapes, and sleek fixtures.

name: Eclectic
description: A mix of styles and colors with unique tiles, bold fixtures, and artistic elements.

name: Transitional
description: A balance between traditional and contemporary, with clean lines and elegant details.
